title: I’ll Go With Sweet Today
description: The live-action adaptation of Yoriko Kichijouji’s popular manga series about a reclusive girl who learns to open up when a new boy arrives at school.
altHero: Kana Arima, young girl with short red hair and big eyes
alt1: Arima with Melt Narushima by cherry blossom trees
alt2: Arima and Narushima being approached by a hooded boy
alt3: Arima happy with tears in her eyes
